title: Filter type for authoring info of Building Scene Layer
description: Represents the filter type and the filter value settings for a filter as it is stored in the filter authoring info.

filterType.description: Represents the filter type name. Name is a unique identifier.

filterValues.description: Array of defined filter values. Filter values are the attributes that can be stored for individual fields in a layer.
